name: Pink Peppercorn Botanical Gimlet
preparation:
The peppery notes of this Gimlet offset all the spirit’s floral and fruit notes.

This recipe originally appeared as part of “On the Fence About Gin? Try 3 Ways to Use 3 Gin-Like Vodkas.”

In a cocktail shaker, lightly muddle the pink peppercorns until crushed.

Add remaining ingredients with ice and shake until well-chilled.

Double-strain into a highball glass over fresh ice.

Garnish with a lime wheel and a few peppercorns.
